Posts.Content: I was diagnosed in feb with grade 3 breast cancer, have had chemo, surgery (lumpectomy and all nodes removed) and am half way through my radiotherapy. I am finding it really difficult to stay positive know I'm nearly at the end of my treatment but what then ? are you supposed to just get back to normal ? what if it comes back somewhere else? ....don't know how to move ;o(((
Posts.Title: What now ?

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone for your kind words. I especially like the idea of "new normal" that it what I should embrace ;0) ..my bc nurse is always busy when I call and takes forever to get back to me so may pop along to the maggies centre. xxxx
Posts.Title: What now ?
